cgcloud__Tactic_Product_Condition__c.name: cgcloud__Tactic_Product_Condition__c
cgcloud__Tactic_Product_Condition__c.description: Use this object to store the internal conditions that are generated out of promotions.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Additional_KPI_Value_1__c.description: Value of Additional Condition KPI 1 if it's defined in the template of the related tactic.

cgcloud__Additional_KPI_Value_2__c.description: Value of Additional Condition KPI 2 if it's defined in the template of the related Tactic.

cgcloud__Additional_KPI_Value_3__c.description: Value of Additional Condition KPI 3 if it's defined in the template of the related Tactic.

cgcloud__Bom_Header_Product__c.description: Reference to the BOM header of the product that was used to generate this condition.

cgcloud__Export_Status__c.description: Defines the status of the export process.

cgcloud__In_Product_Filter_Result__c.description: Indicates whether the product is available because it is in the result of the product filter (or, products under this group are in the result of the product filter).

cgcloud__Last_Synced_Date_Time__c.description: Date on which the record was last synced.

cgcloud__Last_Synced_Version__c.description: Version of the record that's synchronized from off-platform.

cgcloud__Listed__c.description: Indicates whether the product is available because it is listed (or, products under this group are listed).

cgcloud__Measure_Code__c.description: The measure code of the condition source KPI that was used to generate this condition.

cgcloud__Product_Part__c.description: Reference to the product part linking the BOM component to its header.

cgcloud__Product__c.description: Product (group) for which the condition is generated.

cgcloud__Status__c.description: Status of the promotion to which the tactic belongs.
